entities.name: PRODUCTIVITY AND BUSINESS PROCESSES
entities.description: Productivity and Business Processes segment consists of products and services in our portfolio of productivity, communication, and information services, spanning a variety of devices and platforms.

entities.name: INTELLIGENT CLOUD
entities.description: Intelligent Cloud segment focuses on cloud-based services.

entities.name: MORE PERSONAL COMPUTING
entities.description: More Personal Computing segment focuses on personalized computing solutions.

entities.name: OFFICE COMMERCIAL
entities.description: Office Commercial is designed to increase personal, team, and organizational productivity through a range of products and services.

entities.name: OFFICE CONSUMER
entities.description: Office Consumer is designed to increase personal productivity through a range of products and services.

entities.name: LINKEDIN
entities.description: LinkedIn provides Talent Solutions, Marketing Solutions, Premium Subscriptions, Sales Solutions, and Learning Solutions.

relationships.relationship_description: Office Commercial is part of the Productivity and Business Processes segment.
Office Consumer is part of the Productivity and Business Processes segment.
LinkedIn is part of the Productivity and Business Processes segment.
